participant_1.background:
I love to watch mystery movies when I'm not baking.
i like to plant flowers in my gardens.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
I prefer a nice glass of wine with my cheese platter.
i live in north dakota.

participant_2.background:
I think my family would be disappointed, but they would still love me.
I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years.
i never knew my dad.
My favorite book is The Little Prince because it reminds me of my dog.
i am a rapper.

content.text: Hi Bard, how are you doing today?
I am doing great, thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am excited to be chatting with you today.
I am excited to chat with you too! What are some of your interests?
I love to bake, read mystery novels, and garden. I also enjoy watching movies and spending time with my family.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to read as well. What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read mysteries and thrillers. I also enjoy reading historical fiction and biographies.
I love mysteries too! I have never read any historical fiction or biographies, but I have heard good things about them.
You should definitely give them a try! They are both very interesting genres.
I will do that! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What are some of your hobbies?
I am a rapper and I love to cook. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to cook too. What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook anything that is spicy. I also love to bake.
I love spicy food too! I love to bake as well.
We should bake something together sometime!
That would be fun! I would love to bake with you.
Great! We can make cookies or cupcakes.
I would love to make cookies! We can make chocolate chip cookies.
Sounds delicious! I can't wait to bake with you.
